title.en: Born as the Daughter of a Wicked Woman

altTitles.en: Born as the Daughter of the Villainess

altTitles.mn: Хорон санаатны охин болж төрсөн нь

altTitles.th: เมื่อฉันเกิดใหม่เป็นลูกสาวนางร้าย

altTitles.es: Nací como la hija de una villana

altTitles.vi: Tôi sinh ra là con gái ác nữ

description.en:
I was born as the villainess's daughter inside a novel. When I was born, Mom's wrongdoings have already been revealed leading to her confinement in the tower, and soon she'll receive a miserable death at the hands of the main characters. I held her hand while looking over my mother who searched for her ex-husband until her dying breath. My small hand entwined Mom's rough one and she finally turned to me with a warm gaze.

"I understand you, Mom."

"..."

"Don't struggle anymore, and rest well."

And don't wait for something like Dad who won't come. At my words, a tear fell from my mother's eye and soon, she comfortably rested. As the novel's villainess is dead, I, her daughter, will also die tomorrow night by those people. And then the second part of the novel will start. A novel where the main characters go on adventures, love and become happy at the first part. But I don't want to die and I have no thoughts of letting the second part flow as it is.

"It's fine even if I'm this mean."

It's a life where I don't know when I'd die anyway, so might as well change how the novel's second part goes.

---
Born as the daughter of a villainess, Daphne lived her entire life hated by everyone she's ever crossed paths with. After her mother's pitiful death, Daphne knows that a similar fate awaits her-- but what did she ever do to deserve it? Why does she have to be branded as a wicked child when she's done no wrong? In order to survive, Daphne will have to take her life into her own hands... but will she be able to make a name for herself, or will she be known as the villainess's daughter forever?

---

description.fr:
Je suis née fille d'une méchante femme dans un roman. À la naissance, ma mère avait déjà été exposée à ses mauvaises actions et était confinée à la flèche, et allait bientôt faire face à une mort misérable entre les mains des personnages principaux. J'ai regardé ma mère, qui était toujours à la recherche de son ex-mari jusqu'au moment où elle est morte et lui a tenu les mains. Ma petite main s'est emmêlée avec la main rugueuse de ma mère et ses yeux pleins de chaleur se sont tournés vers moi.

«Je comprends, Maman.»

«...»

«Ne souffre plus, dors bien.»

N'attendez pas le papa qui ne viendra pas. Des larmes coulèrent des yeux de ma mère à mes paroles, et bientôt elle s'endormit paisiblement. Puisque la «Wicked Woman» du roman est maintenant morte, moi, sa fille, je serai battue à mort par des gens demain soir. Et la deuxième partie du roman va commencer. Un roman chaleureux dans lequel les enfants des personnages principaux commencent leur aventure pleine de bonheur. Mais je ne voulais pas mourir et je n'avais aucune intention de laisser l'histoire se dérouler de cette façon.

«C'est bien d'être méchant.»

J'ai décidé de réécrire complètement la deuxième partie du roman, car c'est une vie qui peut être tuée à tout moment de toute façon.

---

description.id:
Daphne terlahir kembali sebagai karakter dalam novel yang pernah dibacanya Novel itu merupakan novel dengan akhir bahagia mengenai pemeran utama wanita yang berhasil menaklukkan pemeran antagonis dan menikahi pemeran utama pria.Hidup sebagai putri dari pemeran antagonis tidaklah mudah. Ke mana pun dia pergi, tatapan penuh kebencian akan selalu menghantuinya. Bisakah Daphne melalui rintangan-rintangan kehidupannya dan menemukan akhir bahagianya sendiri?

---

description.tr:
Bir romanda kötü bir kadının kızı olarak doğdum. Annem doğduğunda zaten onun kötü işlerine maruz kalmıştı ve kuleye hapsedildi ve yakında ana karakterlerin elinde sefil bir ölümle karşı karşıya kalacaktı. Öldüğü ana kadar hala eski kocasını arayan anneme baktım ve ellerini tuttum. Küçük elim annemin kaba eline dolandı ve sıcaklıkla dolu gözleri bana döndü. “Anlıyorum anne.” “….” “Artık acı çekme, iyi uyu.” Gelmeyecek olan babamı bekleme. Sözlerimle annemin gözünden yaşlar düştü ve çok geçmeden huzur içinde uykuya daldı. Romanın “Kötü Kadın” artık öldüğüne göre kızı, yarın gece insanlar tarafından dövülerek öldürüleceğim. Ve romanın ikinci bölümü başlayacak. Ana karakterlerin kızının mutluluk dolu macerasına başladığı sıcacık bir roman. Ama ölmek istemiyordum ve hikayenin bu şekilde akmasına izin vermeye hiç niyetim yoktu. “Kötü olmak sorun değil.” Romanın ikinci bölümünü tamamen yeniden yazmaya karar verdim çünkü bu her an ölebilecek bir hayat.

---
